data.name: A single platform giving you access to multiple systems and enabling you to apply digitally for products or services and perform self-maintenance without any forms
data.value: 'n Enkele platform wat jou toegang tot verskeie stelsels bied. Jy kan digitaal om produkte of dienste aansoek doen en self jou sake bestuur sonder om enige vorms in te vul

data.name: A solution that offers you real-time client-to-bank data automation to streamline your business operations
data.value: 'n Oplossing wat jou intydse kliënt-tot-bank-dataoutomatisering bied vir sakebedrywighede wat seepglad verloop

data.name: Are you about to settle your home loan?
data.value: Is jy op die punt om jou huislening af te betaal?

data.name: Becoming a homewoner has never been easier
data.value: Om 'n huiseienaar te word, was nog nooit so maklik nie

data.name: Due to insurance changes, your new instalment details are as follows
data.value: As gevolg van versekeringsveranderings is u nuwe paaiementbesonderhede soos volg

data.value: Besoek nedbank.co.za/ Business Banking/MPS vir meer inligting

data.value: Besoek nedbank.co.za/Business Banking/Protect vir meer inligting

data.value: Kry toegang tot duisende nuwe kliënte

data.value: voorafgoedkeuring* kry vir die huisleningsbedrag waarvoor jy kwalifiseer

data.name: Get the best card acceptance solution for your business
data.value: Kry die beste kaartaanvaardingsoplossing vir jou besigheid

data.name: Get the best cover against everyday risks
data.value: Kry die beste dekking teen alledaagse risiko's

data.name: get three property reports for free, giving you information about property values, comparative values, nearest amenities and more; and
data.value: drie gratis eiendomsverslae kry, wat jou inligting oor eiendomswaardes, vergelykende waardes, naaste geriewe en meer gee; en

data.name: Get up to R15 000 cash back
Get up to R15 000 cash back on your approved home loan amount if you apply online
data.value: Kry tot R15 000 van jou goedgekeurde huisleningsbedrag in kontant terug as jy aanlyn aansoek doen

data.name: Go to nedbank.co.za/Business Banking/Contact Us to get in touch with your banker
data.value: Besoek nedbank.co.za/Business Banking/Contact Us om met jou bankier te skakel

data.name: If you have any questions about the content of your statement, please contact your private banker or the Nedbank Private Wealth Service Suite on
data.value: As u enige navrae oor die inhoud van u staat het, skakel u privaat bankier of die Nedbank Private Wealth-dienssuite by

data.name: If you have any questions about the content of your statement, please feel free to call us on
data.value: As u enige navrae oor die inhoud van u staat het, skakel ons gerus by

data.name: If you have any questions about the content of your statements, please feel free to contact your Business Manager or e-mail: business @nedbank.co.za
data.value: As jy enige vrae oor jou staat het kontant gerus besigheidsbestuurder of stuur ‘n e-pos na: business@nedbank.co.za

data.name: Manage your cash flow better with CASHtrack that sends detailed information from your existing cash solution directly into your line-of-business system
data.value: Bestuur jou kontantvloei beter met CASHtrack wat gedetailleerde inligting vanaf jou bestaande kontantoplossing regstreeks na jou besigheidstelsel stuur

data.name: Settling your home loan is a huge financial accomplishment. If you are about to do so, please use the Nedbank Money app or Online Banking (features tab) to request your settlement amount or call us on
data.value: Om jou huislening af te betaal is 'n groot finansiële mylpaal. As jy op daardie punt is, gebruik asseblief die Nedbank Money-toep of Aanlyn Banksake (die'features'-oortjie) om jou vereffeningsbedrag te vra,of bel ons by

data.name: Stay in control of your finances and manage your home loan account at your convenience. Download
data.value: Bly in beheer van jou geldsake en bestuur jou huisleningsrekening soos wat vir jou gerieflik is. Laai die

data.name: Subject to verification and property valuation
data.value: Hang van ondersoek en eiendomswaardasie af

data.name: Try the Nedbank Home-buying Toolkit on the Nedbank Money app today. Simply open the app and click on
data.value: Probeer vandag nog die Nedbank Home-buying Toolkit op die Nedbank Money-toep. Maak net die toep oop en klik op

data.name: We understand that the cost of electricity is putting strain on your wallet. We would like to use our money expertise to help you manage your electricity budget. You can finance solar energy solutions with your home loan, which will help you reduce or negate your monthly electricity bill, and you won't have to worry about future electricity tariff hikes. For more information visit
data.value: Ons verstaan dat jy die uitdagings van elektrisiteitskoste aan jou beursie voel. Ons wil graag ons geldvernuf inspan en jou help om jou elektrisiteitsbegroting te bestuur. Jy kan sonkragoplossings saam met jou huislening finansier, wat sal help om jou maandelikse elektrisiteitsrekening minder te maak of selfs heeltemal uit te skakel, en jy hoef jou nie oor toekomstige elektrisiteitstariefverhogings te bekommer nie. Vir meer inligting, besoek

data.name: We value your continued support and look forward to being of service to you
data.value: Ons waardeer jou volgehoue ondersteuning en wil jou graag van diens wees

data.name: With the Nedbank Home-buying Toolkit you can
data.value: Met die Nedbank Home-buying Toolkit kan jy

data.name: Your account does not automatically close once you have paid up your home loan, you have to follow a bond cancellation process. Your settlement letter has more information, or call us on
data.value: Jou rekening sluit nie outomaties as jy jou huislening afbetaal het nie – jy moet nog 'n verbandkanselleringproses volg. Jou vereffeningsbrief het meer inligting, of bel ons by

data.name: Book an appointment with your banker
Book your appointment on Online Banking
data.value: Maak jou afspraak op Aanlyn Banksake

data.name: Book your appointment on the Money app
data.value: Maak jou afspraak op die Money-toep

data.name: Contact your relationship banker to apply
data.value: Kontak jou verhoudingsbankier om aansoek te doen

data.name: For your convenience, you can now book an appointment with your banker online. Simply log in to the Money app or Online Banking, choose a time slot that suits you and specify whether you prefer to have the meeting over the phone or in person
data.value: Vir jou gerief, kan jy nou aanlyn 'n afspraak met jou bankier maak. Teken net in op die Money-toep of Aanlyn Banksake, kies 'n tyd wat jou pas en sê of jy jou bankier persoonlik wil ontmoet of oor die telefoon wil gesels

data.name: Get advertising, discounted vouchers, masterclasses, templates, pitch-decks, troubleshooting chats with experts and more - everything your business needs at your fingertips! Join today at
data.value: Kry advertensies, afslagkoopbewyse, meesterklasse, voorbeelde van dokumente, voorleggings, toegang tot kundiges om probleme op te los en meer – alles wat jou besigheid nodig het met die druk van 'n knoppie! Sluit vandag nog aan by

data.name: Join Nedbank Money Message and invite your customers to make quick and secure payments through WhatsApp. Registering as a Money Message merchant is easy - there's no paperwork and no waiting period. Simply add the number for Money Message, +27 (0)87 240 6272, to your contact list and start chatting in WhatsApp by sending 'Hi'. Follow the prompts to complete your registration and start sending invoices to your customers
data.value: Sluit aan by Nedbank Money Message en nooi jou kliënte om vinnige en veilige betalings via WhatsApp te doen. Dit is maklik om as 'n Money Message-handelaar te registreer - daar is geen papierwerk of wagtyd nie. Voeg net die Money Message-nommer, +27 (0) 87 240 6272, by jou kontaklys en begin gesels in WhatsApp deur 'Hi' te stuur. Volg dan die stappe om jou registrasie te voltooi en stuur fakture aan jou kliënte

data.name: Our flagship PocketPOS device for small-business owners is a convenient, low-cost solution that you can use in-store and on the go. It's now available to Nedbank clients for only R89
data.value: Ons vlagskip-PocketPOS-toestel vir eienaars van kleinsakeondernemings is 'n gerieflike, goedkoop oplossing wat jy in die winkel of selfs elders kan gebruik. Dit is nou beskikbaar vir Nedbank-kliënte teen slegs R89

data.name: Our revised pricing schedule applies from 1 January 2022. For more information go to
data.value: Ons hersiene pryslys geld vanaf 1 Januarie 2022. Besoek nedbankprivatewealth.co.za vir meer inligting

data.name: Settling your home loan is a huge financial accomplishment. If you are about to do so, please use the Nedbank Private Wealth app or Online Banking (features tab) to request your settlement amount or call us on
data.value: Om jou huislening af te betaal is 'n groot finansiële mylpaal. As jy op daardie punt is, gebruik asseblief die Nedbank Private Wealth- toep of Aanlyn Banksake (die 'features'- oortjie) om jou vereffeningsbedrag te vra, of bel ons by

data.name: SimplyBiz - the free, one-stop platform for business owners when you need it
data.value: SimplyBiz - die gratis, eenstop-platform vir sake-eienaars wanneer jy dit nodig het

data.name: The Nedbank Private Wealth Service Suite is available 24/7 for any queries you may have. Call us on
data.value: Die Nedbank Private Wealth-dienssuite is 24/7 beskikbaar vir enige navrae wat jy het. Bel ons by

data.name: Thinking of starting another business? Then the Startup Bundle is just what you need. Enjoy six months of no monthly fees plus 20 free electronic transactions, a dedicated relationship banker and beyond-banking support. Helping you do big things. Apply now. T&Cs apply
data.value: Dink jy daaraan om nog 'n besigheid te begin? Dan is die bondelrekening vir nuwe besighede (Startup Bundle) net wat jy nodig het. Jy betaal geen maandelikse gelde vir ses maande nie, kry 20 gratis elektroniese transaksies, 'n toegewyde verhoudingsbankier en ondersteuning wat verder as net banksake strek. Ons help jou om groot dinge te doen. Doen nou aansoek. B&V’s geld

data.name: Tired of waiting for the post to arrive? Switch to eStatements today
data.value: Moeg vir die pos gewag? Skakel vandag nog oor na eState

data.name: Try our app and Online Banking. Stay in touch with local and global markets, your wealth and us
data.value: Gebruik ons toep en aanlyn banksake. Bly op hoogte van plaaslike en glob

data.name: Visit money-message.co.za to find out more
Visit nedbank.co.za/homeloans or call our service suite to register
data.value: Besoek nedbank.co.za/homeloans of bel ons dienssuite om te registreer

data.name: Want better control of your cashflow? Track your finances, set budgets, create and manage invoices, and more with MoneyTracker - a free money management tool available on the Money app and Online Banking. Visit nedbank.co.za/moneytracker for more information
data.value: Wil jy weet waarheen jou geld gaan? Hou jou geld dop, stel begrotings op, skep en bestuur fakture en meer met MoneyTracker - 'n gratis geldbestuurshulpmiddel op die Nedbank Money-toep en Aanlyn Banksake. Kontak jou verhoudingsbankier of besoek nedbank.co.za/moneytracker vir meer inligting

data.name: You can now follow Nedbank Private Wealth on LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter
data.value: Jy kan Nedbank Private Wealth nou op LinkedIn, Facebook en Twitter volg
